{"request":"[read_file for 'commit_message_draft.txt'] Result:

DRAFT COMMIT MESSAGE (Processing 1000/3029 lines):

refactor: Improve geometric primitives and path handling

Core Changes:
- Add runtime validation for parameter space coordinates
- Add explicit conversion operator to double for 1D coordinates
- Add *= operator for coordinate scaling
- Add comparison operators for 1D parameter points

Geometric Point Improvements:
- Replace raw derivatives array with FrameVectors class
- Add RiemannianMetric computation
- Add surface-specific edge detection functionality
- Add pushforward/pullback transformations

Path System Refactoring:
- Convert SurfacePath to use std::function for evaluation
- Refactor path classes to use ParamPoint types consistently
- Improve shared_ptr usage with enable_shared_from_this
- Add nearest point functionality to manifolds
- Streamline path segment and transition path implementations

RiemannianMetric Enhancements:
- Improve documentation of differential geometry concepts
- Rename vector conversion methods for clarity (raise/lower indices)
- Remove redundant pullback/pushforward vector operations
- Add frame vector validation and consistency checks

Surface System Improvements:
- Rename Surface3DImpl to Surface3D for clarity
- Add nearest point calculation functionality
- Switch to std::bind for function binding throughout
- Improve manifold interface implementation
- Streamline surface collection edge handling

Development:
- Update development guidelines in .clinerules
- Enforce const correctness in surface pointers
- Use std::bind for function binding instead of lambdas

Surface Implementation Changes:
- Convert FlatPatch from implementation class to direct surface class
- Replace world_to_param with more efficient nearest point calculations
- Streamline parameter space coordinate handling in flat and sphere surfaces
- Improve path intersection solving with better parameter space validation

Path Calculation Improvements:
- Remove RK4 integration in favor of simpler evaluation methods
- Introduce SLERP-based calculations for smoother interpolation
- Simplify path segment evaluation logic
- Improve numerical stability in path calculations

Geodesic Implementation:
- Add surface type-specific geodesic computation strategies
- Implement exact geodesics for developable surfaces
- Add SLERP-based great circle computation for spheres
- Improve numerical stability in geodesic calculations

Path Evaluation Enhancements:
- Switch to consistent ParamPoint type usage throughout
- Remove redundant parameter validation code
- Optimize point/tangent/normal evaluation methods
- Add better error handling for edge cases

TransitionPath Improvements:
- Add surface type-specific path generation
- Simplify segment handling with direct surface access
- Add proper error handling for unsupported surface types
- Improve path solver integration for smooth surfaces

RiemannianMetric Refinements:
- Add detailed documentation for cotangent/tangent space conversions
- Improve variable naming for geometric clarity (covariant/contravariant)
- Add explicit comments for metric tensor operations
- Enhance pullback/pushforward with better geometric interpretations

Path Creation Improvements:
- Replace world_to_param with nearest point functionality
- Add proper handling of projected directions
- Improve path segment creation with better parameter space handling
- Use std::bind with PathSegment evaluation functions
- Add proper length preservation in projected paths

Surface Collection Updates:
- Use shared_ptr consistently for surface management
- Improve transition path handling with better evaluation functions
- Add proper metric tensor usage for velocity transformations
- Enhance path intersection calculations

Test Suite Updates:
- Update all tests to use new nearest point API
- Remove normal distance assertions (no longer part of API)
- Update path evaluation tests to use ParamPoint1
- Add proper error handling tests for degenerate cases
- Update transformation tests for new coordinate systems

Parameter Space Transformations:
- Remove direct world_to_param usage throughout
- Add proper handling of points outside parameter range
- Improve coordinate transformations with metric tensor
- Add better validation for degenerate cases

{"request":"[read_file for 'docs/tasks/path_surface_unification.md'] Result:

# Path and Surface Unification

## Overview
Unifying paths and surfaces under a common manifold framework to leverage their shared characteristics:
- Parameter space to world space mapping
- Connection/transition handling
- Geometric information at points

## Current State
- Manifold base template implemented and working
- Surface implementations successfully converted to use Manifold framework
- Basic manifold operations verified through tests
- Coordinate system and geometric point templates in place
- Surface3D successfully inheriting from Manifold<2,3,WorldSpaceTag>

## Remaining Implementation

### 1. Path Implementation (In Progress)
Converting path classes to use Manifold framework:
```cpp
// Implemented structure
using WorldPath3D = Manifold<1, 3, WorldSpaceTag>;  // 1D -> 3D world
using ParamPath2D = Manifold<1, 2, ParamSpaceTag>;  // 1D -> 2D param
```

Progress:
✓ Updated Path3D to properly inherit from Manifold
✓ Converted to stack-based storage for derivatives
✓ Fixed inheritance hierarchy and virtual methods
✓ Basic tests passing

Remaining steps:
- Convert remaining path implementations (GeodesicCurve, PathSegment, TransitionPath)
- Ensure path length calculations work with new framework
- Add path-specific manifold tests

### 2. Collections and Connections
```cpp
template<int ParamDim, int TargetDim, typename SpaceTag>
class ManifoldCollection {
    // Will unify SurfaceCollection and path transition logic
};
```

Key steps:
- Create ManifoldCollection template
- Migrate existing collection functionality
- Implement unified connection system
- Add connection validation tests

## Implementation Plan

1. Path Implementation
   - Convert Path3D base class
   - Update path implementations
   - Verify path length calculations
   - Add path manifold tests

2. Collections
   - Create ManifoldCollection template
   - Migrate surface collection logic
   - Add path transition support
   - Implement connection validation
   - Add collection tests

## Benefits
1. Unified infrastructure for paths and surfaces
2. Better type safety through templates
3. Simplified maintenance with shared code
4. Cleaner architecture for future extensions

## Testing Strategy
- Convert path tests to use manifold interface
- Add specific tests for path length invariants
- Verify connection behavior in collection tests
- Ensure backward compatibility maintained

## Files to Update
- include/shap/path.hpp
- include/shap/path3d.hpp
- src/path.cpp
- src/path3d.cpp
- tests/path_tests.cpp
- tests/path_length_tests.cpp
- tests/manifold_tests.cpp

## New Files Needed
- include/shap/manifold_collection.hpp
- src/manifold_collection.cpp
- tests/manifold_collection_tests.cpp

{"tool":"newFileCreated","path":"temp_commit_msg.txt","content":"refactor: Improve geometric primitives and path handling

Core Changes:
- Add runtime validation for parameter space coordinates
- Add explicit conversion operator to double for 1D coordinates
- Add *= operator for coordinate scaling
- Add comparison operators for 1D parameter points

Geometric Point Improvements:
- Replace raw derivatives array with FrameVectors class
- Add RiemannianMetric computation
- Add surface-specific edge detection functionality
- Add pushforward/pullback transformations

Path System Refactoring:
- Convert SurfacePath to use std::function for evaluation
- Refactor path classes to use ParamPoint types consistently
- Improve shared_ptr usage with enable_shared_from_this
- Add nearest point functionality to manifolds
- Streamline path segment and transition path implementations

RiemannianMetric Enhancements:
- Improve documentation of differential geometry concepts
- Rename vector conversion methods for clarity (raise/lower indices)
- Remove redundant pullback/pushforward vector operations
- Add frame vector validation and consistency checks

Surface System Improvements:
- Rename Surface3DImpl to Surface3D for clarity
- Add nearest point calculation functionality
- Switch to std::bind for function binding throughout
- Improve manifold interface implementation
- Streamline surface collection edge handling

Development:
- Update development guidelines in .clinerules
- Enforce const correctness in surface pointers
- Use std::bind for function binding instead of lambdas

Surface Implementation Changes:
- Convert FlatPatch from implementation class to direct surface class
- Replace world_to_param with more efficient nearest point calculations
- Streamline parameter space coordinate handling in flat and sphere surfaces
- Improve path intersection solving with better parameter space validation

Path Calculation Improvements:
- Remove RK4 integration in favor of simpler evaluation methods
- Introduce SLERP-based calculations for smoother interpolation
- Simplify path segment evaluation logic
- Improve numerical stability in path calculations

Geodesic Implementation:
- Add surface type-specific geodesic computation strategies
- Implement exact geodesics for developable surfaces
- Add SLERP-based great circle computation for spheres
- Improve numerical stability in geodesic calculations

Path Evaluation Enhancements:
- Switch to consistent ParamPoint type usage throughout
- Remove redundant parameter validation code
- Optimize point/tangent/normal evaluation methods
- Add better error handling for edge cases

TransitionPath Improvements:
- Add surface type-specific path generation
- Simplify segment handling with direct surface access
- Add proper error handling for unsupported surface types
- Improve path solver integration for smooth surfaces

RiemannianMetric Refinements:
- Add detailed documentation for cotangent/tangent space conversions
- Improve variable naming for geometric clarity (covariant/contravariant)
- Add explicit comments for metric tensor operations
- Enhance pullback/pushforward with better geometric interpretations

Path Creation Improvements:
- Replace world_to_param with nearest point functionality
- Add proper handling of projected directions
- Improve path segment creation with better parameter space handling
- Use std::bind with PathSegment evaluation functions
- Add proper length preservation in projected paths

Surface Collection Updates:
- Use shared_ptr consistently for surface management
- Improve transition path handling with better evaluation functions
- Add proper metric tensor usage for velocity transformations
- Enhance path intersection calculations

Test Suite Updates:
- Update all tests to use new nearest point API
- Remove normal distance assertions (no longer part of API)
- Update path evaluation tests to use ParamPoint1
- Add proper error handling tests for degenerate cases
- Update transformation tests for new coordinate systems

Parameter Space Transformations:
- Remove direct world_to_param usage throughout
- Add proper handling of points outside parameter range
- Improve coordinate transformations with metric tensor
- Add better validation for degenerate cases"}

<final_file_content path="temp_commit_msg.txt">
refactor: Improve geometric primitives and path handling

Core Changes:
- Add runtime validation for parameter space coordinates
- Add explicit conversion operator to double for 1D coordinates
- Add *= operator for coordinate scaling
- Add comparison operators for 1D parameter points

Geometric Point Improvements:
- Replace raw derivatives array with FrameVectors class
- Add RiemannianMetric computation
- Add surface-specific edge detection functionality
- Add pushforward/pullback transformations

Path System Refactoring:
- Convert SurfacePath to use std::function for evaluation
- Refactor path classes to use ParamPoint types consistently
- Improve shared_ptr usage with enable_shared_from_this
- Add nearest point functionality to manifolds
- Streamline path segment and transition path implementations

RiemannianMetric Enhancements:
- Improve documentation of differential geometry concepts
- Rename vector conversion methods for clarity (raise/lower indices)
- Remove redundant pullback/pushforward vector operations
- Add frame vector validation and consistency checks

Surface System Improvements:
- Rename Surface3DImpl to Surface3D for clarity
- Add nearest point calculation functionality
- Switch to std::bind for function binding throughout
- Improve manifold interface implementation
- Streamline surface collection edge handling

Development:
- Update development guidelines in .clinerules
- Enforce const correctness in surface pointers
- Use std::bind for function binding instead of lambdas

Surface Implementation Changes:
- Convert FlatPatch from implementation class to direct surface class
- Replace world_to_param with more efficient nearest point calculations
- Streamline parameter space coordinate handling in flat and sphere surfaces
- Improve path intersection solving with better parameter space validation

Path Calculation Improvements:
- Remove RK4 integration in favor of simpler evaluation methods
- Introduce SLERP-based calculations for smoother interpolation
- Simplify path segment evaluation logic
- Improve numerical stability in path calculations

Geodesic Implementation:
- Add surface type-specific geodesic computation strategies
- Implement exact geodesics for developable surfaces
- Add SLERP-based great circle computation for spheres
- Improve numerical stability in geodesic calculations

Path Evaluation Enhancements:
- Switch to consistent ParamPoint type usage throughout
- Remove redundant parameter validation code
- Optimize point/tangent/normal evaluation methods
- Add better error handling for edge cases

TransitionPath Improvements:
- Add surface type-specific path generation
- Simplify segment handling with direct surface access
- Add proper error handling for unsupported surface types
- Improve path solver integration for smooth surfaces

RiemannianMetric Refinements:
- Add detailed documentation for cotangent/tangent space conversions
- Improve variable naming for geometric clarity (covariant/contravariant)
- Add explicit comments for metric tensor operations
- Enhance pullback/pushforward with better geometric interpretations

Path Creation Improvements:
- Replace world_to_param with nearest point functionality
- Add proper handling of projected directions
- Improve path segment creation with better parameter space handling
- Use std::bind with PathSegment evaluation functions
- Add proper length preservation in projected paths

Surface Collection Updates:
- Use shared_ptr consistently for surface management
- Improve transition path handling with better evaluation functions
- Add proper metric tensor usage for velocity transformations
- Enhance path intersection calculations

Test Suite Updates:
- Update all tests to use new nearest point API
- Remove normal distance assertions (no longer part of API)
- Update path evaluation tests to use ParamPoint1
- Add proper error handling tests for degenerate cases
- Update transformation tests for new coordinate systems

Parameter Space Transformations:
- Remove direct world_to_param usage throughout
- Add proper handling of points outside parameter range
- Improve coordinate transformations with metric tensor
- Add better validation for degenerate cases

</final_file_content>
